website_summaries.verdict: A great art-themed Advent calendar that comes with daily Play-Doh accessories.
pros: The affordable set doesn't just come with 24 accessories
there are also 5 tubs of Play-Doh
Suitable for ages 3 and up, it's a great interactive Advent calendar filled with fun tools to use with the included Play-Doh
cons: Not enough Play-Doh to last 24 days

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much we are ordering two next year!
customer_reviews.text: My two boys LOVED this. This Play-doh Advent Calendar is a very simply designed Advent calendar. Starting on the 1st, we opened a door every morning. They were so excited to see what play-doh toy that they would get. There were scissors and cutters and rollers and many stamps. I was able to get away with one this year, but next year I will definitely order two because I think that they will both want their own Advent Calendar to open. So much better than just chocolates. In fact, it is the Friday before Valentine's Day and they are over in the playroom playing with some of these item right now. Highly highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: S L Sipe

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but don't know if Play-Doh can really do an entire Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute idea for an Advent Calendar as my son (almost 5 at the time) loves Play-Doh. However, he got bored with the items. I know it's tough- it's play-doh, but he really enjoyed getting tools to play with- the roller, the scissors, things like that...but he was less interested in getting things like antlers or a Christmas hat. He really enjoyed the Play-Doh that came with it, but he wanted to use it all on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Andre

customer_reviews.title: Fun for youngsters
customer_reviews.text: Our Elf on the shelf brought this for my son on the first of December and he thought it was quite fun. We opened all of the playdoh on the first day, and on each subsequent day you received an accessory. Some were more fun than others. He got some cookie cutters, embossing trays, angel wings, antlers, and more. It was fun for my 2 year old, but he was jeslous of his older brothers calendar which had toys.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Cute Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: What an adorable idea for an Advent calendar! I bought this for my 3 year old son as he is currently obsessed with all things playdoh. He is going to be so excited when he sees this! I like that it comes with 5 small containers of playdoh in addition to the 24 accessories that he gets to open everyday of Advent.
customer_reviews.author: RiverSong

customer_reviews.title: I like this set a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this set a lot. It's good for younger kids, as the numbers are in order so they don't have to hunt around forever for the right number. It's just the next in line. Mostly shape cutters (Xmas tree, bell, snow man, snow flake, etc), some tools (scissors, knife), and a few things you insert (santa hat, reindeer antlers, angel wings). Comes with a mat too, which my son wasn't interested in. Also 4-5 small playdoh cans. All in all I'd recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old daughter liked opening up a new door everyday
customer_reviews.text: My 7.5 year old daughter liked opening up a new door everyday, but she didn't play with it as much as I expected. She liked the two containers of glitter play-doh but I don't think there was enough play-doh to make anything big, I suggest purchasing extra full size cans of play-doh to add to the fun and suggest the calendar for kids 6 and younger.
customer_reviews.author: B. Desevilla

customer_reviews.title: Countdown to Christmas Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a toddler, he was so excited to open each little door he had to have the Play-doh pried out of his hands when he fell asleep! Cute packaging and a great gift to help little ones countdown the days until Christmas. Not a religious countdown, but a fun tradition for any family.
customer_reviews.author: M. Podolec

customer_reviews.title: and the antlers and other stick in pieces are fun. Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: decent amount of playdoh included in the set. The cutters are cute, and the antlers and other stick in pieces are fun. Cons: expensive for the amount of pieces, got sort of boring after the second week- we ended up forgetting to open everyday towards the end because it was the same old stuff..
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was so excited every day to open a ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited every day to open a window and find the surprise inside. The calendar also comes with 5 containers of play doh to start with, two of which are the glittery play doh (nice surprise). Very reasonable priced compared to most of the options out there. I hope they come out with a new version next year. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not exciting enough!
customer_reviews.text: We get a new advent calendar and this just didn’t spark interest. You start with 6 tubs of play dough and each day, open a different tool. Some were hard for my child to recognize. We won’t order next year.
customer_reviews.author: JMac329

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 2 year old (and 6 year old loved it too)
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old LOVED this calendar! It was perfect! We get a Lego one for my 6 year old son every year and we were trying to figure out something for my daughter. She could play with the pieces everyday (nothing was too small for her). Fun, Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: A cute play doh set for any kid that loves to play with play doh.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Prefect Preschool Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit for the entire month of November. My preschooler loves all things play-doh and having a little treat each day was super fun. Now she has quite the array of Christmas themed molds and cutting tools and a rolling pin. This is a great alternative to candy advent calendars.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Play-interactive (not candy) advent calendar, mostly molds
customer_reviews.text: 2 year-old son loves it, although didn't play with it much after about halfway through b/c the items were mostly molds. If there were more variety, may keep him busy longer. I love that this advent calendar wasn't candy though and was play-interactive.
customer_reviews.author: Guinevere Lee

customer_reviews.title: This was fun to do as opposed to candy in an advent ...
customer_reviews.text: This was fun to do as opposed to candy in an advent calendar. She has had fun using the different pieces. Not exciting in terms of variety of what you get...majority all cookie cutter shapes or press and mold type, but a nice change. What you see in photo is identical to what we got in our calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle momma

customer_reviews.title: Great countdown!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! My 2.5 year old son loved opening up each door and playing with all of the contents. I just wish they would come out with a new Christmas/advent calendar each year!!
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 year old (3 in February) and he absolutely loved it. He was so excited every day to ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 2 year old (3 in February) and he absolutely loved it. He was so excited every day to open a new day. It also helped with his numbers. The molds were great. I was getting into making little scenes with him. His favorite was a toss up between the toy soldier/nut cracker and the gingerbread man.
customer_reviews.author: Chelseakc

customer_reviews.title: 3 1/2 year old loved opening each day
customer_reviews.text: 3 1/2 year old loved opening each day. It was mainly little molds. It would have been more fun if it had a better variety of tools. You definitely need extra playdoh.
customer_reviews.author: AlliE31

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 2 year old. He really enjoys opening it up each day. All of the molds are Christmas themed bell, tree, ornament, etc. Also, has a roller, scissors and a play doh knife. Keeps him busy for a little bit each morning so I can enjoy a cup of coffee. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Raymond E.

customer_reviews.title: The play doh was nice, it wasn't overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The play doh was nice, it wasn't overpriced, but the accessories weren't that great. I'd say that it's a decent gift for your own kid if you know they're into play-do, but probably not a nice thing for someone else's, with the many breakable, losable, and step-onnable parts.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nonymous

customer_reviews.title: (playmobil etc) Love that is came with new (small size) cans of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old and I wish I would have gotten it for my 2 older children as well (5 & 9 yrs). They all wanted to play with this vs. their own advent calendars that I had spent far more on....(playmobil etc) Love that is came with new (small size) cans of play doh as well.
customer_reviews.author: stacie

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. He still plays with it almost every day. I hope the come out with a different set for next Christmas, because I know he'd love to get another playdoh advent calender.
customer_reviews.author: strsneyes

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVED opening these throughout the holidays. He was only 2 years when doing so, but with supervision it made for a GREAT time!!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Fun but requires effort to open doors neatly
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter and my niece (each almost 6), they love it. Doors are a little difficult to open without ripping apart the box a bit, so for little kids you may have to aid in this aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good option for a gift for the new yea
customer_reviews.text: Good option for a gift for the new year.Large box. Child will love.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: my son was a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: There wasn't as much as I had hoped for or expected for the kids to do with this. Honestly, my son was a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: xraykate

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for candy or toys.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the information on the outside of the box my child will love this when it comes time for Advent this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: paws4love

customer_reviews.title: Great for the newbie play-doh collectors.
customer_reviews.text: My son was just getting into playing with play-doh and this was a great starter because it had all the little beginning pieces, plus some cute holiday pieces. He was so happy and very excited.
customer_reviews.author: StephGilch

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loved this! She was super excited to open a ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loved this! She was super excited to open a new slot each morning. Do be prepared to buy more play doh though, the small cans provided were not enough for 24 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: excellent gift and too bad this is being discontinued. A great hit with my 5 year old niece.
customer_reviews.author: Master Shopper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: All it has is little cans of play doh my daughter was just hoping for more toys I suppose
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Formanek

customer_reviews.title: Excited
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son really enjoyed opening this calendar up. He was excited everyday to see what he had gotten!
customer_reviews.author: F. M. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: The stamps are boring to a 5 year old. That is basically all they have opened so far.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn green

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So much better than that yucky cheap chocolate. My only complaint is that the doors tears too easy and you end up ripping multiple doors
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be as expected a few small containers of ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be as expected a few small containers of play dough and each day has a tool to play with it. My 5 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is a good activity for kids the only thing wrong is a mat it comes all ripping
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 4-yr old loves playdoh ~ This is the perfect advent calendar for her ~ Everyday is a new reason to play playdoh ~ Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Kids really enjoyed this product! A lot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Graybill

customer_reviews.title: Literally brought our family together!
customer_reviews.text: This was a dream for our 3 and a half year old. He and his 5 year old and 13 year old sister play together every day with the play doh!
customer_reviews.author: Pandora Peckne

customer_reviews.title: I gave this as a gift to my three year ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my three year old niece. Her Mom says she loves it, and has been really enjoying it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Not Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely messy, all paydoh is, and molds are a bit small
customer_reviews.text: It’s another company trying to cash in on the kids advent calendar. In general it’s another playdoh set, so be prepared for a huge mess. Also, make sure you either store the playdoh well and have extra around as a month worth of opening and closing tends to dry it out and when that happens, make sure to put your ear plugs in. The molds are pretty small, so very hard to really see what they are when you are playing with them. Just a meh set.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Yolish

customer_reviews.title: He loved opening up different toys each day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 1/2 year old. He loved opening up different toys each day. And the sparkly play doh was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gossett-Hale

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome advent calendar! Lots of small cookie cutter type shapes and tools to use. My daughter loves it! Also, it comes with five good sized cans of playdoh!
customer_reviews.author: Tristi

customer_reviews.title: Best Advent Calender Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This advent calender is so much fun!!! We can't wait to open it each day!!
customer_reviews.author: S.T.S

customer_reviews.title: My son is going to love this, too
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My son is going to love this, too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: My son picked this out and it is great so far! Each day has a different shaped cuter.
customer_reviews.author: NicGrazi

customer_reviews.title: fun for kids who like play-doh
customer_reviews.text: We bought this out of season, but my son has still really enjoyed playing with it. The containers of play-doh are a little small, but there enough to build some things with.
customer_reviews.author: G90410

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who is 6 years old. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Caron

customer_reviews.title: So much fun leading up to Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is a huge hit with my 4 year old son. It comes with the 5 containers of Playdoh (2 of which are sparkly) and every day, he gets to open a door and get a new Playdoh accessory. Usually it is a cookie cutter type toy, but he has gotten other things too, like scissors. He really looks forward to the daily event building up to Christmas. I like that it gives him a fun activity every day and it is not just candy or whatever. The toy aspect really adds something to the advent experience for him.
customer_reviews.author: JayneDoah

customer_reviews.title: Not very exciting, multiples of the same shape cutter ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very exciting, multiples of the same shape cutter,even though it was of different xmas items. My 3 year has lost interest and stopped being excited to open every day
customer_reviews.author: Kristin L. Indge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase. Just something little for my son to open every day. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Lacey N. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My children love this product and so do I
customer_reviews.text: My children love this product and so do I. Happily surprised with all the extra Christmas accessories for play doh.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to food advent calendars! My 2yo loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard I.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was great loads of fun - shame they don't make them anymore
customer_reviews.author: M. Brockbank

customer_reviews.title: So so. But built anticipation nicely for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why, but I expected more. The box was a bit flimsy and after a few flaps were opened it just looked like I was using an old toy package as a decoration rather than a cute advent calendar. It was a decent price and the kids looked forward to opening the flaps every day and having a small play doh session. The kids would have probably given this product five stars but for me it was meh.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Perhaps with a Side of Caffeine
customer_reviews.text: Our 4-year-old daughter is waking us up at 4-6am EVERY. DAY. so she can open the new daily window in her Play Dough advent calendar. Weekends. Our days off. Holidays. It is safe to say she likes it and it inspires her to use the molds ad such from the calendar to play with her PlayDough at least once a day. I can't wait for Christmas...and caffeine each morning.
customer_reviews.author: MiyazakiFan

customer_reviews.title: I'm very glad that Play-Doh offers this one
customer_reviews.text: The choice is ridiculously limited in toy advent calendars. I'm very glad that Play-Doh offers this one. It's a great one. My kids would have enjoyed the calendar more if I hadn't trusted the baby-sitter not to let the kids tear it apart on day three. Ah well! They will still play with the play-doh and the holiday tools until Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: pru

customer_reviews.title: Good Alternative to Chocolate Advent Calendars
customer_reviews.text: My son had an allergic reaction to the chocolate in his advent calendar this year. Since he was so excited about his advent calendar, I scrambled to find a non-edible one that would make him forget the chocolate one. This product succeeded with that and then some. The excitement he had opening and playing with him play doh each day was worth of every penny.
customer_reviews.author: J Shea

customer_reviews.title: Worst Advent Calendar We've Ever Purchased.
customer_reviews.text: A truly pathetic advent calendar with very little play-doh and miniscule plastic molds that never worked properly. Much better options from Lego and Disney out there for the children. Please do not suffer through this one.
customer_reviews.author: N. Brockmann

customer_reviews.title: boring advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My kids were not excited about thurs calendar. You will lose all the pieces by the 25th.
customer_reviews.author: Guzmanna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids had fun with it, couldn't wait for the next day box to open.
customer_reviews.author: Gearldine Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: The accessories are not great quality but the kids are enjoying it and that is all that matters. For the price, it is worth buying. Just plan on buying extra play-doh to go with it, especially if you have more than one kid. Overall, I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hayes

product_meta.title: Play-Doh - B21999 - Modeling Compound Toy - Xmas Advent Calendar - Includes 5 Colour Tubs
product_meta.description: Count down to the holidays, Play Doh style. Does Door 5 hide a snowflake stamper. Is there a tree mould behind Door 1. You will have to find out whats hiding in the Advent Calendar. With a different surprise for each day leading up to the holiday, theres no knowing what festive creations you will be able to shape for the season and beyond. Includes 24 surprises, playmat, and 5 cans of Play Doh Brand Modelling Compound. Play-Doh and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Get creative with this Play Doh holiday countdown calendar
24 secret doors hide a different surprise for each day of the season
Includes playmat, 24 surprises and 5 cans of Play Doh modeling compound featuring 2 Sparkle cans to let your season shine
There is no knowing what festive creations you will be able to shape for the season
Play Doh Advent Calendar is suitable for ages 3 years and over

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars189 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
